HTMLMapElement.summary: The HTMLMapElement interface provides special properties and methods (beyond those of the regular object interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating the layout and presentation of map elements.

HTMLMapElementAreas.summary: The areas read-only property of the interface returns a collection of {{HTMLElement("area")}} elements associated with the {{HTMLElement("map")}} element.

HTMLMapElementName.summary:
The name property of the represents the unique name <map> element.
Its value can be used with the useMap attribute of the img element to reference a <map> element.

remarks.para: If an id attribute is set on the map element, then this name property should be the same as this id.
